entries.description: CodeWhisperer: UI notification "no suggestion" not shown correctly
Lower chance of project upload failures when using Q CodeTransform.
FeatureDev: Rejected files are excluded when generated code is accepted by the customer
Fix CodeWhisperer API call failure in SageMaker Code Editor
CodeWhisperer: Improve UI to indicate CodeWhisperer is generating suggestions
Q CodeTransformation: show prompt to submit feedback at end of job
Improved performance: SSM Documents and Step Functions LSP clients/servers are now started only when they are needed.
CodeWhisperer: Improve UI to walk through new CodeWhisperer users how-to
CodeWhisperer/Q actions are now available from the status bar menu instead of a dedicated panel.
Expose listConnections API in AWS Toolkit
